Nazi ezinye izimpawu nezimbangela zesikhathi sokuya esikhathini sekwedlule isikhathi:

1. Ukungabikho kokuya esikhathini Isibonakaliso esisobala kakhulu sesikhathi sekwephuzile ukungabikho kokuya esikhathini lapho kulindeleke ukuba zenzeke. Uma isikhathi sakho singaphezu kwesonto sekwephuzile, kubhekwa njengokubambezeleka okukhulu. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi izindlela zokungahambi ngezikhathi ezithile kumjikelezo wokuya esikhathini zijwayelekile futhi zingabangelwa yizici ezahlukahlukene.

2. Izinguquko ekukeni kwesifuba Abanye besifazane bangathola ushintsho ekubukeni ukuncelisa ibele noma ngesibonakaliso sesikhathi esizayo. Uma amabele akho azizwa ezwela kakhulu kunokujwayelekile futhi awukaze uhlangabezane nokukhululeka kulolu hlobo, kungakhombisa isikhathi esibambezelekile.

3. Ukuqhakaza kanye nokungahambi kahle kwesisu Ukuqhakaza kanye nokungaphatheki kahle kwesisu yizimpawu ezijwayelekile ezihambisana nokuya esikhathini. Uma uhlangabezana nalezi zimpawu ngaphandle kokuqala kwesikhathi sakho, kungaba uphawu lwesikhathi sekwephuzile.

4. Ukushintshwa kwemizwa nokungahambi kahle Abesifazane abaningi bathola ukushintshwa kwemizwelo, ukungacasuki, kanye noshintsho olungokomzwelo ezinsukwini eziholela esikhathini sazo. Uma ubona lezi zimpawu kodwa isikhathi sakho asifikanga, kungakhombisa ukubambezeleka.

5. Izici zokucindezela nezindlela zokuphila Ukucindezela kanye nezinto ezahlukahlukene zokuphila zingaba negalelo esikhathini sokuya esikhathini. Izinga eliphakeme lokucindezelwa lingaphazamisa ibhalansi ye-hormonal futhi kuthinte imvamisa yomjikelezo wakho. Izinguquko emaphethini okulala, ukudla, inqubo yokuzivocavoca, noma ukuguquguquka kwesisindo okubalulekile kungathinta isikhathi sesikhathi sakho.

6. I-Hormonal Imbabancences Ama-Hormonal ukungalingani kungaholela emijikelezweni yokuya esikhathini engajwayelekile kanye nezikhathi sekwephuzile. Izimo ezinjenge-polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) kanye nezinkinga ze-thyroid zingathinta ukukhiqizwa kwama-hormone futhi ziphazamise njalo ukujikeleza kwakho kokuya esikhathini. Uma usola ukungalingani kwe-hormonal, kubalulekile ukuthi uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze ihlolwe futhi alawulwa kahle.

7. Ukukhulelwa Isikhathi sekwephuzile singaba uphawu lokukhulelwa, ikakhulukazi uma usebenza ngokobulili ngaphandle kokusebenzisa inzalo. Uma usola ukukhulelwa, kungakuhle ukuthi uthathe isivivinyo sokukhulelwa ekhaya noma uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze uqinisekise.

heading: Ungenza kanjani isikhathi sokweza ngokushesha?
title: Ukwenza isikhathi kufike ngokushesha
body:
izindlela zokukhuthaza ngokwemvelo ukuqala kokuya esikhathini Ukuya esikhathini kuyinqubo yemvelo eyenzeka emzimbeni wesifazane, futhi isikhathi sayo sinqunywa ngezinguquko ezahlukahlukene ze-hormonal kanye nomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Ngenkathi kungenzeki ukwenza isikhathi sakho size ngokushesha uma umjikelezo wakho usuvele usuqalile, kunezindlela ezithile zemvelo ezingasiza ukulawula umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini futhi asekele ibhalansi ye-hormonal enempilo. Nazi izindlela ezimbalwa okufanele zicatshangelwe:

1. Gcina indlela yokuphila enempilo Indlela yokuphila enempilo ingaba nomthelela ekulinganiseni kwe-hormonal kanye nemijikelezo yokuya esikhathini njalo. Cabanga ngemikhuba elandelayo:
    I-
  • Yidla ukudla okulinganiselayo: Ukudla okunempilo okufaka izithelo, imifino, okusanhlamvu okuphelele, amaprotheni anciphile. Gwema ukusetshenziswa ngokweqile kokudla okucutshungulwe, ukudla okulula okunoshukela, neziphuzo. I-
  • Hlala i-hydrate: Phuza inani elanele lamanzi usuku lonke ukusekela impilo ephelele ne-hydration.
  • Ukuzivocavoca umzimba njalo: Thintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo kwezincomo zokuzivocavoca ezenziwe ngezifiso.
  • Phatha ukucindezelwa: Ukuxineka okungamahlalakhona kungathinta ibhalansi ye-hormonal futhi uphazamise umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Amasu anciphisa ukucindezela, njengokuzindla, ukuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula, noma ukuzibandakanya kokuzilibazisa nemisebenzi oyithandayo. I-
  • Phila ngokwanele: Ihlose amahora angama-7-9 ukulala kwekhwalithi ubusuku ngabunye ukuze uxhase inhlala-kahle kanye ne-hormonal Regulation.

    2. Amakhambi amakhambi nezithasiselo Amanye amakhambi amakhambi nezithasiselo asetshenziselwa ngokwesiko ukusekela impilo yempilo. Kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi ubufakazi besayensi maqondana nokusebenza kwabo bunqunyelwe, futhi kuhlale kunconywa ukubonisana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ngaphambi kokusebenzisa noma yimiphi amakhambi noma izithasiselo. Ezinye izinketho okufanele zicatshangelwe zifaka:
      I-
    • Iqabunga leqabunga: I-raspberry leaf itiye kukholakala ukuthi inezakhiwo ze-uterine toning futhi zingasekela umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini ezinempilo.
    • Vitamin B6: Ezinye izifundo zibonisa ukuthi uvithamini B6 angasiza ukulawula umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Kutholakala ekudleni okufana ne-chickpeas, i-tuna, ama-salmon kanye nobhanana. I-
    • CHASTERBENDBERVERBERVERBERVERBERVERBERVERBERBENTBER (VITEX AGNUS-RATUS): Le herb ivame ukusetshenziswa ukubhekana nokungahambi kahle kokuya esikhathini kanye nezimpawu zokwedlula zonke. Kungasiza ukulinganisa amazinga we-hormone.

      3. Ukwelashwa kwe-Heat Therapy Ukufaka isicelo sokushisa endaweni yesisu kungasiza ukuphumula izicubu, ukukhuthaza ukuhamba kwegazi, futhi kunikeze impumuzo kusuka ekunciphisweni kokuya esikhathini. Ungasebenzisa i-Heating Pad, ibhodlela lamanzi ashisayo, noma ugeze ngokufudumele ukunciphisa ukungakhululeki. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi ukwelashwa kokushisa akwenzi isikhathi sakho size ngokushesha kodwa singanikeza impumuzo yesikhashana.

heading: Ngingakwazi ukucindezela isikhathi sami ngokushesha?
title: Isikhathi sokucindezela ngokushesha
body:
Ngingakwazi ukucindezela isikhathi sami ngokushesha? Ukuqonda umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini nezindlela Ukuya esikhathini kuyinqubo yemvelo eyenzeka emzimbeni wesifazane futhi ayikwazi ukukhokhwa noma isheshiswa ngentando. Umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini ulawulwa izinguquko ezahlukahlukene ze-hormonal futhi uhilela ukuchitheka kwe-sitene lining. Ngenkathi kungenzeki ukucindezela isikhathi sakho ngokushesha, nansi ukuqonda okujulile komjikelezo wokuya esikhathini kanye neminye imibono eyiphutha evamile:

1. Izisekelo zokuya esikhathini izisekelo Umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini umjikelezo wenyanga wanyanga zonke olungiselela umzimba ukuze ukhulelwe. Ngokwesilinganiso, kuhlala cishe ezinsukwini ezingama-28, yize kungahluka kumuntu nomuntu. Umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini uqukethe izigaba eziningana:
    I-
  • Isigaba Sokuya esikhathini: Lesi yisigaba lapho kuchithwa i-sitene lining, okuholela ekushayweni kokuya esikhathini. Imvamisa ihlala izinsuku ezingama-3-7. I-
  • Isigaba se-Follicular> Ngalesi sigaba, ama-follicles kuma-ovari avuthiwe futhi alungiselele i-ovulation. Imvamisa ihlala izinsuku ezingama-7-14. I-
  • ovulation: ovulation kwenzeka lapho kukhishwa iqanda elivuthiwe kwi-ovary. Imvamisa kwenzeka usuku nosuku lwe-14 lomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. I-
  • Isigaba seLuteal: Ngemuva kwe-ovulation, i-follicle evuthiwe iguqula ibe yi-corpus luteum, ekhiqiza i-progesterone ukusekela ukukhulelwa okungenzeka. Lesi sigaba sihlala izinsuku eziyi-12-14.

    2. Imibono eyiphutha mayelana nezikhathi zokucindezela ngaphandle ngokushesha Kunemibono emincane emihle nezinganekwane izindlela ezizungezile noma amasu okucindezela isikhathi esiphuma ngokushesha. Kubalulekile ukubhekana nale mibono eyiphutha futhi uqonde ukuthi ukukhohlisa umjikelezo wemvelo wokuya esikhathini akunakwenzeka. Nazi izinganekwane ezimbalwa ezivamile:
    I-

    Inganekwane 1: Ukuzivocavoca ngamandla Abanye abantu bakholelwa ukuthi ukuzibandakanya ekusebenzeni kahle komzimba noma ukuzivocavoca ngamandla kungacindezela isikhathi ngokushesha okukhulu. Ngenkathi ukuvivinya umzimba kunezinzuzo eziningi zempilo ephelele, akunakhono lokusheshisa umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Kodwa-ke, ukuzivivinya njalo, kungasiza ukulawula umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.
    I-

    Inganekwane 2: Ukuhlanzwa kwesithonjana noma sokuhlanza isitho sangasese sowesifazane Ukuhlanza noma ukusebenzisa imikhiqizo yokuhlanza ama-vaginal akuyona indlela ephephile noma ephumelelayo yokukhohlisa umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Eqinisweni, ukuhlaziya kungaphazamisa ukulinganisela kwemvelo kwamagciwane esithweni sangasese sowesifazane futhi kwandise ubungozi bokutheleleka. Kubalulekile ukugwema imikhuba enjalo futhi ulondoloze inhlanzeko efanele ngaphandle kokuzama ukuguqula umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini.
    I-

    Inganekwane 3: Ukuthatha Imithi Ye-Hormonal Ngenkathi umuthi we-hormonal, njengamaphilisi okulawula ukuzalwa, angasetshenziselwa ukulawula umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini futhi aphathe izimo ezithile, kufanele asetshenziswe kuphela ngaphansi kokuholwa nguchwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo. Ukuthatha umuthi we-hormonal ngaphandle kwesizathu sezokwelashwa nokuqashwa okufanele kungaba nemiphumela emibi ebhalansi yakho ne-hormonal.

heading: cramp kepha akusekho isikhathi okwamanje
title: ama-cramples ngaphandle kwesikhathi
body:
cramps kodwa akunasikhathi: Izimbangela ezingaba khona kanye nezincazelo Ukuthola ama-cramps ngaphandle kwesikhathi kungadida futhi maqondana. Ngenkathi ama-cramps avame ukuhlotshaniswa nokuya esikhathini, kunezizathu ezahlukahlukene zokuthi kungani kungenzeka uhlangabezana nokuqhosha ngaphandle kokuqala kwesikhathi sakho. Nazi ezinye izimbangela nezincazelo:

1. I-Ovulation I-ovulation ukukhishwa kweqanda kusuka ku-ovary, okuvame ukwenzeka phakathi komjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Abanye besifazane bangathola ukumiswa okuncane ngesikhathi sokubopha, esaziwa ngokuthi yiMittelschmerz. Lokhu kukhubazeka kungenzeka ngasohlangothini lwesisu esingezansi futhi kuvame ukuhlala isikhashana. Yinto evamile futhi akuyona imbangela yokukhathazeka.

2. Ukukhulelwa Ukukhubazeka kungaba uphawu lokuqala lokukhulelwa. Ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa kusenesikhathi, iqanda elivundisiwe lizifaka ekulweni kwesibeletho, esingadala ukungakhululeki nokungaphatheki kahle. Lokhu kwaziwa ngokuthi ukufakwa kokufakelwa futhi kungahle kwenzeke ngesikhathi isikhathi sakho kufanele. Uma usola ukuthi kungenzeka ukhulelwe, kunconywa ukuthi kuthathe ukuhlolwa kokukhulelwa ukuze uqinisekise.

3. Izinguquko zeHormonal Ukushintshashintsha kwamazinga we-hormonal kungadala ukuqina ngisho nokungabikho kwenkathi. Ama-himonal ukungalingani angenzeka ngenxa yezici ezahlukahlukene ezifana nengcindezi, izinguquko ngesisindo, umuthi, noma izimo zezempilo ezingaphansi. Lokhu kuguquka kwama-hormonal kungadala ukuqhekeka njengoba umzimba uvumelana namazinga we-hormone aguqukayo. Uma usola ukungalingani kwe-hormonal, kungakuhle ukuthi uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze ahlolwe okunye.

4. I-Pre-Syndrome yangaphambi kokuya esikhathini (i-PMS) I-Pre-Syndrome yangaphambi kokuya esikhathini (i-PMS) iqoqo lezimpawu ezenzeka ezinsukwini noma amasonto aholela esikhathini sokuya esikhathini. I-Cramping iyisibonakaliso esivamile se-PMS futhi senzeka ngaphambi kokuqala kwesikhathi sakho. Ezinye izinkomba ze-PM zingafaka ukuqhakaza, ubumnene bebele, ukushintshwa kwemizwelo, nokukhathala. Ukugcina impilo enempilo, ukuphatha ukucindezela, nokuzinakekela kungasiza ukunciphisa izimpawu ze-PMS.

5. Isifo sokuvuvukala kwe-pelvic (PID) Isifo sokuvuvukala kwe-pelvic (i-PID) ukutheleleka kwezitho zokuzala, okuvame ukubangelwa izifo ezithathelwana ngocansi (ama-STI) njenge-chlamydia noma i-gonorrhea. I-Cramping ingaba uphawu lwepid, kanye nezinye izibonakaliso ezinjengokukhungatheka kwangasese okungajwayelekile, izinhlungu ngesikhathi sokuya ocansini nomkhuhlane. Uma usola ukuthi kungenzeka ube nepid, kubalulekile ukufuna ukwelashwa ukuthola ukutholakala nokwelashwa.

6. I-Ovarian Cysts Ama-Systs we-Ovanian ama-fluid agcwele uketshezi angakha kuma-ovari. Zivame ukubhema futhi zixazulule ngokwazo. Kodwa-ke, ama-cysts amakhulu noma lezo ezibangela ukusonteka kwesibeletho kungaholela ekucindezelekeni nasekucabangeni kwe-pelvic. Uma uhlangabezana nokuqina okukhulu noma okuphikelelayo, kungcono ukuthintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze ahlolwe nokuphatha okufanele.

heading: Hlobo luni lwama-cramps akhombisa ukukhulelwa?
title: Ukuqina nokukhulelwa
body:
Ukukhulelwa Conformation: Ukuqonda izinhlobo ezahlukene Ukuthola ama-cramps ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa kuvame kakhulu futhi kungaba yingxenye evamile yezinguquko ezenzeka emzimbeni wakho. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuqonda izinhlobo ezahlukene ze-cramps kanye nezinkomba zabo ezingaba khona. Nasi umhlahlandlela wokukusiza uqaphele izinhlobo ezahlukahlukene zama-cramps okungenzeka ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa:

1. I-Infantation Cramps I-Infantial CrampS yenzeka lapho iqanda elivundile lizifaka emathabeni ekulweni kwesibeletho. Lezi zinhlaka zivame ukuba mnene futhi zingahambisana nokukhanya okukhanyayo noma ukopha. Ukufakwa ngokujwayelekile kwenzeka cishe ezinsukwini eziyi-6 kuye kwayi-12 ngemuva kokukhulelwa, futhi abanye besifazane bangathola ukuminyaza okuncane ngalesi sikhathi.
Ama-inclantation cramps avame ukuchazwa njengemizwa emfushane, efana ne-twinge efana noma ingcindezi emnene esiswini esingezansi. Ngokuvamile bafushane ngesikhathi futhi bakhulu kakhulu ukwedlula ukulimala kokuya esikhathini.

2. Izinhlungu ze-ligament eziyindilinga Ubuhlungu be-ligament abayindilinga buyimbangela evamile yokuqhakaza ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa, ikakhulukazi ku-trimester yesibili. Ama-ligaments ayindilinga atholakala nhlangothi zombili zesibeletho futhi asekele isibeletho esikhulayo ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa. Njengoba isibeletho sinwebeka, ama-ligaments ayindilinga angalula futhi adale ukungaphatheki kahle noma ukuqhosha.
Ubuhlungu be-ligament abayindilinga buvame ukuchazwa njengobukhali, ukugwazwa, noma ukudonsa imizwa kwizinhlangothi eyodwa noma zombili zesisu esingezansi. Kungabonakala kakhulu lapho kushintsha izikhundla noma ngokunyakaza okungazelelwe. Lolu hlobo lokucindezela luvame ukungabi nabungozi futhi luxazulule ngokwalo.

3. Izivumelwano ze-Braxton Hick Izivumelwano zeBraxton Hick zivame ukubizwa ngokuthi "ukusebenza kwamanga" noma "ukufeza izivumelwano." Ziyizivumelwano ezi-sporadic zemisipha yesibeletho esenzeka kukho konke ukukhulelwa, kepha zitholakala kakhulu kwi-trimester yesithathu.
Izivumelwano zeBraxton Hick zingazizwa zinjengemnene ukucindezela noma ukuqina kwesibeletho. Zivame ukungajwayelekile ngokujwayelekile esikhathini esivamisile kanye nesikhathi, futhi azikhuli ubukhulu ngokuhamba kwesikhathi. Ngokungafani nemisebenzi yeqiniso yezabasebenzi, ama-Braxton Hick Contrincials awabangeli ukwenziwa komlomo wesibeletho noma aholele ekuqaleni kwabasebenzi.

4. Igesi nokugaya discomfort Ama-hormone okukhulelwa anganciphisa ukugaya futhi aphumule izicubu zomzimba wepheshana lesisu, elingaholela kugesi, ukuqhakaza kanye nokungaphatheki kahle kwesisu. Lezi zimpawu kwesinye isikhathi zingaba ngephutha ngokuqhekeka.
Ama-cramp ahlobene negesi abonakala ngokusobala ngobuhlungu obuthambile, obuhlungu esiswini esingezansi futhi kungahle kuhambisane nokuqhakaza, ukukhohlisa, noma ukuthopha. Ngokuvamile bakhululeka ngogesi noma ngokunenhlangano yamathumbu.

5. Izinhlungu ze-ligament eziyindilinga Njengoba isibeletho sinwebeka ukuze samukele ingane ekhulayo, ingabeka ingcindezi ezithweni nasezinhlelweni ezizungezile, kufaka phakathi ama-ligaments nemisipha endaweni ye-pelvic. Le ngcindezi ingadala ukungahambi kahle nokucindezela.

heading: Ngabe utshwala bungabathinta umjikelezo we-ovulation?
title: Utshwala kanye ne-ovulation
body:
umthelela wotshwala emjikelezweni we-ovulation Ukusetshenziswa kotshwala kungaba nemiphumela ehlukahlukene ohlelweni lokuzala lwabesifazane, kufaka phakathi umjikelezo we-ovulation. Umjikelezo we-ovulation uyinqubo eyinkimbinkimbi elawulwa ama-hormone, futhi noma yikuphi ukuphazamiseka kulokhu kwebhalansi okuntekenteke kungathinta ukuzala. Nakhu okudingeka ukwazi mayelana nokuthi utshwala bungabathinta kanjani umjikelezo we-ovulation:

1. Ukuphazamiseka kwe-hormonal Utshwala bungaphazamisa ukulinganisela kwe-hormonal emzimbeni, okubalulekile ekuqondisweni komjikelezo we-ovulation. Ukuphuza utshwala kungaphazamisa ukusebenza okujwayelekile kwe-hypothalamus kanye ne-pituitary gland, edlala indima ebalulekile ekunikezeni umkhiqizo we-hormone.
I-hypothalamus ikhipha i-gonadotropin-ukukhulula ama-hormone (GNRH), okusayina i-pituitary gland ukukhipha i-hormone ye-hormone (ye-LH) ne-Follicle evuselelayo. Lawa ma-hormone anesibopho sokuvuselela ukukhula kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwama-follicle kuma-ovari, kanye nokukhishwa kwamaqanda avuthiwe ngesikhathi sokuvuthwa.
Ukuphuza ngokweqile ngokweqile kungaphazamisa ukukhishwa kwe-GNRH, LH, kanye ne-FSH, okuholela ekungalweni okungahambi kahle emjikelezweni we-ovulation. Kungadala i-ovulation ebambezelekile noma ecindezelwe, okwenza kube nzima ukubikezela iwindi elivundile nohlelo lokukhulelwa.

2. I-ANONONTANT Ukusetshenziswa kotshwala kuhlotshaniswe nengozi eyandayo yokungena kwe-annovation, okungukungekho kwe-ovulation. I-ANOVAND ingenzeka ngenxa yokungalingani kwe-hormonal, futhi umthelela wotshwala emthethweni we-hormone ungafaka isandla kulesi simo.
Ucwaningo luye lwabonisa ukuthi abesifazane abadla utshwala, ikakhulukazi ngokweqile, bangathola ukuphazamiseka emjikelezweni wabo wokuya esikhathini kanye nethuba elengeziwe lokuphanga. I-ANOVAND ingawuthinta kakhulu ukuzala, njengoba ivimbela ukukhishwa kwamaqanda avuthiwe ngowokuzala.

3. I-Instralfutional Errareguritities Ukuphuza utshwala nakho kungaholela ekulweni okungahambi kahle kokuya esikhathini, okungaba yinkomba yokuphazamiseka kwe-ovulation. Izikhathi ezingekho emthethweni, ezibonakala ngokuhlukahluka ngobude bomjikelezo, ubude besikhathi, noma ukugeleza, kungafakwa umthelela we-alcohol emthethweni we-hormone.
Utshwala bungathinta ukukhiqizwa nokukhishwa kwe-estrogen kanye ne-progesterone, ama-hormone abhekele ukulawula umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Lokhu kungaholela ekungaphathekiseni okufana nemijikelezo emide noma emifushane, izikhathi eziphuthelwe, noma ukopha okungajwayelekile.

4. Kunciphise ukuzala Imiphumela yotshwala emjikelezweni we-ovulation ekugcineni ingaholela ekunciphiseni ukuzala. Ukuphazamiseka ku-ovulation kanye nokungalingani kwama-hormonal kungenza kube yinselele ngokwengeziwe ukukhulelwa.
Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukusetshenziswa kotshwala kuhlobene nengozi eyandayo yokuzala. Ucwaningo luye lwabonisa ukuthi abesifazane abadla utshwala, ikakhulukazi ngamanani amaningi, maningi amathuba okuba nezinkinga zokukhulelwa uma zikhulelwe uma ziqhathaniswa nabaphuza abangaphuzi noma labo abaphuzayo.

heading: Ngabe utshwala buthinta ikhwalithi yeqanda?
title: Utshwala nekhwalithi yeqanda
body:
umthelela wotshwala ngekhwalithi yeqanda Uma kukhulunywa ngokuzala kanye nempilo yokuzala, ikhwalithi yamaqanda idlala indima ebalulekile. Ikhwalithi yeqanda ibhekisa empilweni nokusebenza kweqanda, futhi ithonywa yizici ezahlukahlukene, kubandakanya ubudala, izakhi zofuzo kanye nokukhetha kwendlela yokuphila. Ukuphuza utshwala kungenye into ephila ngayo engahle inomthelela eqanda. Nakhu okudingeka uyazi:

Imiphumela yotshwala ekuthuthukisweni kwamaqanda Ukusetshenziswa kotshwala kungathinta ikhwalithi yeqanda ngezindlela eziningana:

1. Ukuphazamiseka kwe-hormonal Utshwala bungaphazamisa ukulinganisela okubucayi kwama-hormone emzimbeni, kufaka phakathi nalabo ababandakanyeka ekuqondisweni komjikelezo wokuya esikhathini kanye ne-ovulation. Ukungalingani kwe-Hormonal kungathinta ukuvuthwa kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwamaqanda, okuthinta ikhwalithi yabo.
Ucwaningo lubonisa ukuthi utshwala bungaphazamisa ukusebenza okujwayelekile kwe-hypothalamus kanye ne-pituitary gland, okunesibopho sokulawula ukukhiqizwa kwama-hormone emzimbeni. Ukuphuza utshwala kungaphazamisa ukukhishwa kwe-hormone ye-hormone ye-hormone (ye-LH) ne-follicle-evuselelayo ye-follicle (Fsh), okubaluleke kakhulu ku-ovulation kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwamaqanda anempilo.

2. Ukuxineka kwe-oxidative Ukuphuza utshwala kungaholela ekukhulisweni kwengcindezi esongeziwe emzimbeni. Ukucindezelwa oxidative kwenzeka lapho kunokungalingani phakathi kokukhiqizwa kwezinhlobo ze-oxygen esebenzayo (ROS) kanye nekhono lomzimba lokuzihlukanisa nama-antioxidants. Izinga eliphakeme lokucindezela oxetimetive lingaba nemiphumela elimazayo kumaseli, kufaka phakathi amaqanda, okuholela ekulimaleni kwe-DNA futhi kuncishisiwe ikhwalithi yeqanda.
I-Alcohol Metabolism emzimbeni ikhiqiza i-ROS njengokwenziwa kwayo, nokuphuza ngokweqile ngokweqile kungangehlula umzimba we-antioxidant defense. Lokhu kungaholela ekuqongeleleni kwe-ROS, okubangela ukulimala kwe-oxidative kumaqanda futhi kulimaze ikhwalithi yabo.

3. Ukuntuleka kokudla okunempilo Ukuphuza ngokweqile ngokweqile kungaholela ekungashisekeni kwezakhi zomzimba, njengoba utshwala buphazamisa ukumuncwa kanye ne-metabolism yamavithamini namaminerali abalulekile. Izakhi zomzimba ezifana ne-Foote, Vitamin B12, i-zinc, kanye nama-antioxidants zibalulekile ekuthuthukisweni kwamaqanda kanye nempilo yokuzala. Ukusilela kulezi zakhiwane kungahlehlisa ikhwalithi yeqanda nokuzala.
Utshwala bungaqeda umzimba wamavithamini namaminerali abalulekile, ikakhulukazi amavithamini e-B, abalulekile ekukhuleni kwamaqanda okunempilo. Litelenteka, ikakhulukazi, lidlala indima ebalulekile ekuhlolweni kwe-DNA kanye nokwehlukaniswa kwamaseli, okwenza kube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lubalulekile ukuthuthukiswa kwamaqanda asezingeni eliphakeme. I-Alcohol ingaphazamisa ukumunwa kokulindisa kanye nokusetshenziswa, okuholela ekutheni kube lula ukulahla ukuntuleka kanye nekhwalithi yeqanda.

4. Ukuphazamiseka kwe-Follicle Treakvity Ama-ovaries aqukethe ama-follicles leyo ndlu futhi akhulise amaqanda. Utshwala bungaphazamisa ukuthuthukiswa kanye nokusebenza kwalawa ma-follicle, okuthinta ikhwalithi yamaqanda aqukethe. Lokhu kuphazamiseka kungaholela emaqa amaqanda angajwayelekile noma okungajwayelekile, kunciphisa amathuba okuvundiswa okuphumelelayo nokufakwa.

heading: Ngabe uphuza utshwala obungakanani ekuzalani?
title: Utshwala obuphephile bokuzala
body:
utshwala nokuzala: ukuqonda ukusetshenziswa okuphephile Ukusetshenziswa kotshwala kungumkhuba ojwayelekile ezingxenyeni eziningi zomhlaba, futhi abantu abaningi badla njalo utshwala. Kodwa-ke, utshwala bungaba nemiphumela emibi ekuvumeni kwabesilisa nabesifazane. Ngoba imibhangqwana izama ukukhulelwa, kubalulekile ukuqonda ubudlelwano phakathi kotshwala nokuzala ukwenza izinqumo ezinolwazi ngokusetshenziswa kotshwala.
I-

umthelela wotshwala ngokuzala Utshwala bungathinta inzalo ngezindlela eziningi:

1. Ukuphazamiseka kwe-hormonal Ukuphuza utshwala kungaphazamisa ukulinganisela kwe-hormonal kuwo womabili amadoda nabesifazane. Kwabesifazane, utshwala bungathinta umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini futhi baphazamise i-ovulation. Kwabesilisa, utshwala bunganciphisa amazinga e-testosterone futhi banciphise ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda kanye nekhwalithi.

2. Umsebenzi we-ovari anciphile Utshwala bungathinta umsebenzi wama-ovari kwabesifazane. Ukusetshenziswa kotshwala okungapheli kungaholela ekunciphiseni imali ebhukwini, ebhekisa kwinombolo nekhwalithi yamaqanda atholakalayo umanyolo. Lokhu kungenza kube nzima ukukhulelwa.

3. Unyuse isikhathi sokukhulelwa Ucwaningo lukhombisile ukuthi ukusetshenziswa kotshwala, ngisho nakumanani alinganiselayo, kungangezelela isikhathi esidingayo ukuze imibhangqwana ikhulelwe. Utshwala bunganciphisa ukuzala ngokuthinta isikhathi se-ovulation kanye nokuphazamisa ukufakwa kweqanda elivundisiwe.

4. Ingozi eyandayo yokuphuphuma kwesisu Ukuphuza utshwala ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa kwaziwa kakhulu ukwandisa ingozi yokuphuphuma kwesisu nezinye izinkinga zokukhulelwa. Kodwa-ke, nangaphambi kokukhulelwa kwenzeka, ukusetshenziswa kotshwala kungakhulisa ubungozi bokuphuphuma kwesisu kwabesifazane abazama ukukhulelwa.

Ukuphuza utshwala ngokuzala Uma kukhulunywa ngotshwala nokuzala, kunzima ukuchaza izinga eliphephile ngokuphelele lokusetshenziswa. Kodwa-ke, ochwepheshe ngokuvamile batusa imihlahlandlela elandelayo:

1. Ukuzithoba okuphelele Imibhangqwana ezama ukukhulelwa ukukhulelwa, kunconywa ukuthi abesifazane bayeke utshwala ngokuphelele. Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi utshwala bungaba nemiphumela emibi ngokushesha ekuthathweni, futhi ukusetshenziswa kotshwala okulinganiselayo kungangezelela isikhathi esithatha isikhathi sokukhulelwa.

2. Ukumodela kwabesilisa Ngenkathi abesifazane kufanele bagweme ngokuphelele utshwala, amadoda angadla utshwala ngokulinganisela. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi ukusetshenziswa ngokweqile kotshwala kusengaba nemiphumela emibi kwikhwalithi yesidoda nokuzala. Amadoda ayalwa ukuthi anciphise ukusetshenziswa kwawo kotshwala kumazinga alinganiselayo.

3. Ukucatshangelwa Kwesikhathi Uma utshwala budliwe, kungakuhle ukugwema utshwala obuzungeza isikhathi se-ovulation. Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi utshwala bungaphazamisa isikhathi se-ovulation futhi wehlise amathuba okukhulelwa okuphumelelayo.

4. Funa izeluleko zochwepheshe Wonke umuntu uhlukile, futhi umthelela wotshwala ngokuzala uyahluka. Kungcono ngaso sonke isikhathi ukuthintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo noma udokotela wokuzala ngezeluleko ezenziwe ngezifiso ezisuselwa esimweni sakho esithile.

heading: Ingabe i-Folic acid ithuthukisa ikhwalithi yeqanda?
title: Ikhwalithi ye-folic acid nekhwalithi yeqanda
body:
Ubudlelwano phakathi kweFolce acid nekhwalithi yeqanda Uma kukhulunywa ngokuzala kanye nempilo yokuzala, ikhwalithi yamaqanda idlala indima ebalulekile. Izici eziningi zingathonya ikhwalithi yeqanda, okubandakanya ubudala, izakhi zofuzo kanye nokukhethwa kwendlela yokuphila. I-Folic acid, i-b-vitamin yaziwa ngokubaluleka kwayo ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa, iphinde yaphakanyiswa ukuthi ibe nezinzuzo ezingaba khona zekhwalithi yeqanda. Nakhu okudingeka ukwazi ngobudlelwano phakathi kweFolic Acid nekhwalithi yeqanda:

Ukuqonda ikhwalithi yeqanda Ikhwalithi yeqanda ibhekisa empilweni nokusebenza kweqanda. Amaqanda asezingeni eliphakeme anethuba elingcono lokuvundiswa okuphumelelayo, ukufakwa, kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwemibungu enempilo. Njengabesifazane ubudala, inani kanye nekhwalithi yamaqanda abo ehle ngokwemvelo, okungenza kube yinselele ngokwengeziwe ukukhulelwa.

Iqhaza le-folic acid I-Folic acid, eyaziwa nangokuthi i-fotality noma i-Vitamin B9, iyizakhi ezibalulekile zemisebenzi ehlukahlukene yomzimba, kufaka phakathi ukuhlukaniswa kweseli kanye nokwehlukaniswa kwe-DNA. Kubaluleke kakhulu ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa kusenesikhathi ukusekela ukuthuthukiswa kwe-neural tube ku-fetus. I-Folic acid ukwengeza ivame ukunconyelwa kwabesifazane abahlela ukukhulelwa noma basekuqaleni kwezigaba zokukhulelwa.

izinzuzo ezingaba khona zekhwalithi yeqanda Ngenkathi indima eyinhloko ye-folic acid ukusekela ukuthuthukiswa kwe-fetus, ezinye izifundo ziphakamise izinzuzo ezingaba khona zekhwalithi yeqanda. I-Folic acid ibandakanyeka kwinqubo ye-methylation, esiza ekulawuleni i-gene shop futhi igcine ubuqotho be-DNA. Le nqubo ibalulekile ekuhlukaniseni iseli elifanele kanye nokusebenza, kufaka phakathi ukuthuthukiswa kwamaqanda.
Ucwaningo selukhombisile ukuthi ukuntuleka kwe-Folic acid kungaholela ekuphazamisweni kwe-chromosomal emaqanda, kungathinta ikhwalithi yabo. Ngokuqinisekisa ukweba okwanele kwe-folic acid, kuyabonakala ukuthi ubungozi bokuphazamiseka kwe-chromosomal bungancishiswa, kungenzeka kube ngcono amaqanda. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi ubufakazi obukhona ngalesi sihloko bunqunyelwe, futhi kudingeka ucwaningo oluningi ukuze kusungulwe ukuxhumana okucacile phakathi kokungezelelwa kwe-Folic acid nekhwalithi yeqanda.

Ezinye izinzuzo zeFolic Acid Ngenkathi umthelela oqondile weFolic Acid kwikhwalithi yeqanda udinga okunye uphenyo, kunezinye izinzuzo ze-Folic acid ukwengeza impilo yokuzala:

1. Ukuvimbela Ukuphikiswa kwe-Neural Tube Enye yezizathu eziyisisekelo I-Folic Acid ukwengeza inconywa ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa yindima yayo ekuvikeleni iziphene ze-neural tube, ezinjengeSpina Bifida, e-fetus ethuthukisayo. Ukulimala kwe-neural tube kwenzeka ngesikhathi sesigaba sokuqala sokukhulelwa lapho ishubhu le-neural lihluleka ukuvala kahle. Ukuphuza i-folic acid ngaphambi kokukhulelwa ngaphambi kokukhulelwa nangesikhathi sokukhulelwa kusenesikhathi kunganciphisa kakhulu ubungozi balezi zinkinga zokuzalwa.

2. Ukusekelwa kwempilo ephelele yokuzala I-Folic acid ibandakanyeka ekukhiqizweni kwe-DNA ne-RNA, ebalulekile ekuhlukaniseni amaseli nokukhula. Lokhu kufaka phakathi amaseli ahilelekile ezinqubweni zokuzala, njengokuthuthukiswa kwamaqanda nokuvuthwa. Ukuqinisekisa ukuhlinzekwa ngokwanele kwe-folic acid kungasiza ukusekela impilo ephelele yokuzala.

heading: Ngabe utshwala buthinta ukuhamba kwesikhathi
title: Ukugeleza kotshwala nokugeleza kwesikhathi
body:
Imiphumela yotshwala ekuhambeni kokuya esikhathini Ukusetshenziswa kotshwala kuwumsebenzi ojwayelekile wezenhlalo kubantu abaningi. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuqonda ukuthi utshwala bungaba nemiphumela ehlukahlukene emzimbeni, kufaka phakathi imiphumela engaba khona ekuhambeni kokuya esikhathini. Ngenkathi ukusebenzisa utshwala ngezikhathi ezithile kungenzeka kube nomphumela obalulekile, ukungenisa ngokweqile noma okuvame ukwenziwa kotshwala kungaphazamisa umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini okujwayelekile futhi kuthinte ukuhamba kwesikhathi. Nakhu okudingeka uyazi:

1. Imiphumela yeHormonal Ukuphuza utshwala kungathonya amazinga we-hormone emzimbeni, angathinta ngokungaqondile ukuhamba kokuya esikhathini. Utshwala bungaphazamisa ukulingana okubucayi kwama-hormone anjenge-estrogen kanye ne-progesterone, edlala indima ebalulekile ekulaleni umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Lokhu kuphazamiseka kungaholela ezikhathini ezingajwayelekile noma izinguquko ngesikhathi nobungako bokopha kokuya esikhathini.

2. Umsebenzi wesibindi Isibindi sidlala indima ebalulekile kuma-hormone e-metabolizing, kufaka phakathi nalabo abahilelekile kumjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Ukuphuza ngokweqile ngokweqile kungabeka ingcindezi esibindini futhi kulimaze umsebenzi wayo. Lapho isibindi sincishisiwe, kungahlupheka ukuhlanganisa ama-hormone ngempumelelo, okuholele ekungalweni kwama-hormonal okungathinta umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini nokugeleza kwesikhathi.

3. Ukuntuleka kokudla okunempilo Utshwala bungaphazamisa ukumuncwa kwezakhi zomsoco futhi baqede amavithamini kanye namaminerali asemqoka emzimbeni. Ukusetshenziswa kotshwala okungapheli kungaholela ekushishweni okunempilo, okufana nevithamini B eyinkimbinkimbi, i-magnesium, ne-zinc. Lezi zezakhi zibalulekile ukuze zilondoloze ibhalansi ye-hormonal nomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini ezinempilo. Ukusilela kulezi zakhi zomzimba kungasiza ngezikhathi ezingekho emthethweni nokugeleza kokungajwayelekile kokuya esikhathini.

4. I-Dehydration Utshwala buyi-diuretic, okusho ukuthi kwandisa ukukhiqizwa komchamo futhi kungaholela ekuwohlokeni komzimba uma kudliwa ngokweqile. Ukuphelelwa umoya kungathinta ivolumu yegazi nokujikeleza kwegazi, okuthinta ukuhamba kokuya esikhathini. Kwezinye izimo, ukomisa kungadala izikhathi ezinzima noma ezinde. Ukuhlala ama-hydrate kubalulekile ukuze ulondoloze umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini enempilo.

5. Ukuxineka kanye nokuphila kahle okungokomzwelo Ukuphuza ngokweqile ngokweqile kungaba nomthelela emazingeni andayo wokucindezela kanye nomthelela omubi ongokomzwelo. Ukuxineka kwaziwa ukuphazamisa ibhalansi ye-hormonal futhi kungaholela ezikhathini ezingekho emthethweni noma ekushintsheni kokuya esikhathini. Ngokwengeziwe, utshwala bungandisa izimpawu ze-premenstrual syndrome (PMS), njengokushintsha kwemizwelo nokucasulwa.

6. Ukusebenzisana nemithi Uma uthatha noma yimiphi imithi ukuphatha izimpawu zokuya esikhathini noma ezinye izimo zezempilo, kubalulekile ukucubungula ukusebenzisana okunokwenzeka notshwala. Utshwala bungasebenzisana nemithi ethile, buthinta ukusebenza kwabo ngempumelelo noma ukwandisa ingozi yemiphumela emibi. Hlala uthintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo noma usokhemisi ukuze uqonde noma yikuphi ukusebenzisana okukhona phakathi kotshwala nemithi yakho.

7. Ukuhlukahluka komuntu ngamunye Kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi imiphumela yotshwala ngokugeleza kokuya esikhathini ingahluka kusuka kumuntu kuya kumuntu. Abanye abantu bangazwela kakhulu imiphumela yotshwala ekulinganiseni kwe-hormonal kanye nokugeleza kwesikhathi, kanti abanye kungenzeka bangabi nezinguquko ezibonakalayo. Izici ezinjengezempilo jikelele, amakhethini wezakhi zofuzo, kanye namaphethini wokusebenzisa utshwala kungathonya indlela utshwala elithinta indlela yokuya esikhathini.

heading: Yini ebangela izikhathi ezingekho emthethweni
title: Izimbangela zezikhathi ezingekho emthethweni
body:
izimbangela zezikhathi ezingekho emthethweni Izikhathi ezingekho emthethweni zingaba umthombo wokukhathazeka kwabesifazane abaningi. Kunezici ezahlukahlukene ezingaba nomthelela emijikelezweni yokuya esikhathini engajwayelekile, futhi kubalulekile ukuqonda izimbangela ezingaba khona. Ngenkathi izikhathi ezingekho emthethweni zivame ukungabi nabungozi futhi zingavela ngokwemvelo ngezigaba ezithile zokuphila, nazo zingaba uphawu lwesimo sempilo esiyisisekelo. Nazi ezinye izimbangela ezivamile zezikhathi ezingekho emthethweni:

1. I-Hormonal Imbabancences Ama-Hormonal ukungalingani kungenye yezimbangela eziholayo zezikhathi ezingekho emthethweni. Ukushintshashintsha kwamazinga wama-hormone, ikakhulukazi e-estrogen nase-progesterone, kungathinta umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Okunye ukungalingani okuvamile kwama-hormonal okungaholela ezikhathini ezingekho emthethweni kufaka:
    I-
  • polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS): I-PCOS ukugula kwe-hormonal okubonakaliswa ngamazinga aphezulu aphezulu we-androgens (ama-hormone wesilisa) kwabesifazane. Lokhu kungalingani kwe-hormonal kungaphazamisa inqubo ejwayelekile ye-ovulation futhi kuholele ezikhathini ezingekho emthethweni.
  • ukuphazamiseka kwe-thyroid: izimo ezinjenge-hypothyroidism (i-thyroid evuselelwe kabusha) noma i-hyperthyroidism (i-thyroid ethe xaxa) ingathinta ukukhiqizwa kwe-hormone kanye nomthethonqubo, okuholela ekuhangeni okungahambi kahle.
  • perimenopause: njengoba abesifazane beya esikhathini, ukukhiqizwa kwe-estrogen kanye ne-progestesterone kuguquguquka, kubangele izikhathi ezingekho emthethweni kuze kube yilapho ukuya esikhathini ekugcineni kuvimba ngokuphelele.
  • Ukuxineka: Ukucindezela okungamahlalakhona kungathinta ukukhiqizwa kanye nokulinganisela kwama-hormone, okuholela ezikhathini ezingekho emthethweni. I-cortisol ye-Hormone yengcindezi ingaphazamisa ukusebenza okujwayelekile kwama-hormone okuzala.

    2. Izici zendlela yokuphila Izici zendlela yokuphila nazo zingasiza ezikhathini ezingekho emthethweni. Lokhu kufaka:
    • ukuguquguquka kwesisindo ngokweqile: Ukulahlekelwa kwesisindo okubalulekile noma inzuzo kungaphazamisa ukulinganisela kwe-hormonal futhi kuthinte imvamisa yezikhathi. Lokhu kungenzeka ngezimo ezifana ne-anorexia nervosa, i-bulimia, noma ukuzivocavoca ngokweqile.
    • Ukuzivocavoca ngokweqile: Ukuzivocavoca okukhulu kakhulu futhi ngokweqile kungaphazamisa ukulingana okubuthakathaka kwama-hormone futhi kuholele ezikhathini ezingekho emthethweni.
    • umsoco ongemuhle: Ukudla okunempilo okunganele noma ukushiyeka kwezakhi zomzimba ezithile kungathinta ukukhiqizwa kwama-hormone nokuhlala esikhathini.
    • Ukuphazamiseka kokulala: Ukuphazamiseka emaphethini okulala, njengokuqwasha noma umsebenzi wokushintsha, kungathinta ibhalansi ye-hormonal futhi kufake isandla ezikhathini ezingekho emthethweni.

      3. Izimo Zokwelashwa nemithi Izimo ezahlukahlukene zokwelashwa nemithi kungenza izikhathi ezingekho emthethweni. Ezinye izibonelo zifaka:
      • ama-polyps nama-fibroids: Ama-uterine ama-polyps noma ama-fibroids akhula ngokungafanele angakhulisa noma azungeze isibeletho. Lokhu kukhula kungaphazamisa ukuhamba okujwayelekile kokuya esikhathini futhi kubangele izikhathi ezingekho emthethweni. I-
      • endometriosis: I-Endometriosis yisimo lapho izicubu ezivuthayo isibeletho zikhula ngaphandle kwesibeletho. Kungadala ubuhlungu be-pelvic, ukuvuvukala, kanye nezikhathi ezingekho emthethweni.

heading: Izikhathi ezingekho emthethweni zijwayelekile?
title: Izikhathi ezijwayelekile ezingajwayelekile
body:
yizikhathi ezingekho emthethweni ezijwayelekile? Abesifazane abaningi bathola isikhathi esingajwayelekile ngesikhathi esithile ezimpilweni zabo. Ngenkathi ingaba maqondana, kubalulekile ukuqonda ukuthi izikhathi ezingekho emthethweni ngezikhathi ezithile zivame kakhulu futhi zivame ukungabi imbangela ye-alamu. Kodwa-ke, uma unezinto ezikhathazayo ngomjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini, kungcono kakhulu ukuxhumana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze uthole ukutholakala okunembile nokuphathwa okufanele. Nawa amanye amaphuzu athile okufanele acatshangelwe:

yini izikhathi ezingekho emthethweni? Izikhathi ezingekho emthethweni zibhekisela kwimijikelezo yokuya esikhathini ephambuke kwiphethini ephakathi yomjikelezo wezinsuku ezingama-28 ngokugeleza okungaguquki. Izikhathi ezingekho emthethweni zingabonakala ngezindlela ezihlukile, kufaka phakathi:
  • ukweqa izikhathi noma izikhathi eziphuthelwe
  • isikhathi eside noma emifushane kunezikhathi ezijwayelekile
  • ukungahambisani nobude obude
  • isikhathi esingalindeleki sezikhathi
  • Ukushintsha kokugeleza kokuya esikhathini, njengokuphatheka okunzima noma okulula

    izimbangela zezikhathi ezingekho emthethweni Kunezici ezahlukahlukene ezingaba nomthelela ezikhathini ezingekho emthethweni. Ezinye izimbangela ezivamile zifaka:

    1. I-Hormonal Imbancences Ama-Hormonal ukungalingani, ikakhulukazi emazingeni e-estrogen nase-progesterone, angaphazamisa umjikelezo ojwayelekile wokuya esikhathini. Ukushintshashintsha kwamazinga we-hormone kungadalwa yizinto ezifana nengcindezi, izinguquko zesisindo, ukuphazamiseka kwe-thyroid, i-polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS), noma izimo ezithile zokwelashwa.

    2. Ukuthomba kanye ne-perimenopause Ngesikhathi sokuthomba kanye ne-perimenopause (isigaba sesikhashana ngaphambi kokuya esikhathini), ukuguquguquka kwe-hormonal kuvamile. Njengoba umzimba ufinyelela ushintsho futhi ulungisa ukukhiqizwa kwama-hormone, isikhathi esingajwayelekile senzeka.

    3. Izici zendlela yokuphila Izici zendlela yokuphila zingathonya imvamisa yokuya esikhathini. Ukudla okungekuhle, ukuzivivinya ngokweqile, inzuzo enkulu noma ukulahleka kwesisindo, kanye namazinga aphezulu okucindezela konke konke kungafaka isandla ezikhathini ezingekho emthethweni.

    4. Imithi nezimo zezokwelapha Imithi ethile, efana nezindlela zokuvimbela inzalo ze-hormonal, ingaguqula umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini futhi ibangele izikhathi ezingekho emthethweni. Ngokwengeziwe, izimo zezokwelapha ezingaphansi, ezinjengama-polyps, ama-fibroids, endometriosis, noma ukuphazamiseka kokuzala, kungathinta ukuhanjiswa njalo kokuya esikhathini.

    lapho ukufuna izeluleko zokwelashwa Ngenkathi izikhathi ezingekho emthethweni ngokuvamile zingeyona imbangela yokukhathazeka, kubalulekile ukuthintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo uma uhlangabezana nalokhu okulandelayo:
      I-
    • kaningi ngezikhathi ezingekho emthethweni ngaphandle kwephethini ebonakalayo
    • isikhathi esijwayelekile kakhulu (ngaphansi kwezinsuku ezingama-21 ngokuhlukile)
    • Izikhathi eziphuthelwe isikhathi esengeziwe sesikhathi (ngaphandle kokukhulelwa) I-
    • okopha ngokweqile noma ozophahla isikhathi eside
    • Ubuhlungu obukhulu noma ukungaphatheki kahle ngezikhathi
    • Ezinye izimpawu ezingejwayelekile ezihambisana nezikhathi zakho

heading: Ngingazixazulula Kanjani Izikhathi Zami Ezingajwayelekile?
title: Ukuxazulula izikhathi ezingajwayelekile
body:
izixazululo zezikhathi ezingekho emthethweni Ukuba nezikhathi ezingekho emthethweni kungakhungathekisa futhi kungakhombisa ukungalingani kwe-hormonal okuyisisekelo noma ezinye izindaba zezempilo. Ngenkathi kubalulekile ukuthintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze uthole ukuxilongwa okunembile nohlelo lokwelashwa okwenziwe ngezifiso, kunamasu amaningana ongazama ukusiza ukulawula umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini:

1. Gcina indlela yokuphila enempilo Ukuthola indlela yokuphila enempilo kungaba nomthelela omuhle kumjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini. Gxila ekugcineni ekudleni okulinganiselayo okunothile ngezithelo, imifino, okusanhlamvu okugcwele kanye namaprotheni angenayo. Ukuzivocavoca njalo kungasiza nokulawula amazinga we-hormonal futhi kuthuthukise inhlala-kahle yonke. Gwema ukucindezela ngokweqile futhi uzijwayeze amasu wokuphatha ukucindezela njenge-yoga, ukuzindla, noma ukuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula.

2. Landelela umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini Ukulandela umkhondo womjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini kungakusiza ekuboneni amaphethini nokungahambi kahle. Sebenzisa ikhalenda, uhlelo lokusebenza lokulandela esikhathini, noma idayari yesikhathi ukuqopha izinsuku zokuqalisa nezingapheli zezikhathi zakho, kanye nanoma yiziphi ezinye izimpawu noma izinguquko ozibonayo. Lolu lwazi luzoba yigugu lapho luxoxa ngokukhathazeka kwakho ngochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo.

3. Ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kweHormonal Izindlela zokulawula zokuzalwa ze-Hormonal, njengamaphilisi okulawula ukuzalwa, ama-patches, noma amadivayisi we-intrauterine (ama-IUDs), angasiza ukulawula umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini. Lezi zindlela zethula ama-hormone emzimbeni wakho olingisa ukuguquguquka kwemvelo kwe-hormonal, okuholela ezikhathini ezijwayelekile. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuxoxa ngezinketho nemiphumela emibi engaba khona ngochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo.

4. Ukuphathwa kwesisindo Ukugcina isisindo esinempilo kubalulekile ukulinganisela kwe-hormonal. Kokubili ukuzuza isisindo ngokweqile kanye nokunciphisa umzimba kungaphazamisa umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini. Uma ukhuluphele, ulahlekelwa isisindo esilinganiselwe sokudla okulinganiselayo nokuzivocavoca njalo kungasiza ukulawula izikhathi zakho. Ngakolunye uhlangothi, uma unesisindo esibi, ukuthola isilinganiso esinempilo sesisindo singabuyisela ibhalansi ye-hormonal futhi sikhuthaze imijikelezo ejwayelekile yokuya esikhathini.

5. Ikheli Izimo Zempilo Ezingaphansi Kwezimo Izimo zezempilo ezingaphansi, njenge-Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS), ukuphazamiseka kwe-thyroid, noma ukuphazamiseka kokuzala, kungaba nokuphazamiseka kwezikhathi ezingekho emthethweni. Uma usola isimo esingaphansi, thintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze uthole ukuxilongwa okufanele nohlelo lokwelashwa. Ukuphatha isimo esingaphansi kwesinye isikhathi kungasiza ukulawula umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini.

6. Amakhambi amakhambi Amanye amakhambi amakhambi asetshenziselwa ngokwesiko ukusekela impilo yokuya esikhathini futhi alawule izikhathi. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi ubufakazi besayensi obusekela ukusebenza kwabo bunqunyelwe. Izibonelo zifaka i-cnasteberry, isinamoni, i-ginger, kanye ne-turmeric. Khuluma nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ngaphambi kokuzama noma yimiphi amakhambi okuqinisekisa ukuthi aphephile futhi alungele wena.

7. Ukuncishiswa kwengcindezi Ukucindezela kungaphazamisa ibhalansi ye-hormonal futhi kufake isandla ezikhathini ezingekho emthethweni. Ukuthola amasu wokuphatha wokucindezela asebenzayo, njengokuzivocavoca, amasu wokuphumula, izinto zokuzilibazisa, noma ukwelulekwa, kungasiza ukunciphisa amazinga okuxineka nokukhuthaza umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini.

heading: Yiziphi izimpawu zesikhathi esingajwayelekile?
title: Izimpawu zesikhathi esingajwayelekile
body:
izimpawu zesikhathi sokuya esikhathini esingajwayelekile Ukuya esikhathini kuyingxenye evamile yomjikelezo wowesifazane wokuzala, kepha kunezimpawu ezithile ezingakhombisa isikhathi esingajwayelekile. Kubalulekile ukuqaphela lezi zibonakaliso futhi uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo uma uhlangabezana nalokhu okulandelayo:

1. Imijikelezo yokuya esikhathini engajwayelekile Umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini angajwayelekile ubonakala ngokuhlukahluka okuphambili ngobude obuyimijikelelo noma ngezikhathi ezingalindeleki phakathi kwezikhathi. Uma izikhathi zakho zenzeka ngezikhathi ezingekho emthethweni, kungakhombisa ukungalingani okuyisisekelo kwe-hormonal noma ezinye izindaba zezempilo ezidinga ukunakwa.

2. Ukopha ngokweqile noma okuhlala isikhathi eside Uma uzwa ukopha ngokweqile noma isikhathi sakho kuhlala isikhathi eside kunezinsuku eziyisikhombisa, kungaba uphawu lwesimo esibizwa ngokuthi amaMenorrhagia. AmaMenorrhagia angaholela ekulahlekelweni kwegazi okubalulekile, ukukhathala, futhi angakhombisa inkinga eyisisekelo efana nokungalingani kwama-hormonal, ama-fibroids e-Uterine, noma ama-polyps.

3. Ubuhlungu obukhulu noma ama-cramps Ngenkathi okunye ukungaphatheki kahle noma ukuminyanisa ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini kujwayelekile, ubuhlungu obukhulu obuphazamisa imisebenzi yakho yansuku zonke bungaba uphawu lwesimo esingaphansi. Izimo ezinjenge-endometriosis noma i-adenomyosis zingadala ubuhlungu obukhulu be-pelvic, izinhlungu zangemuva, futhi kungadinga ukungenelela kwezokwelapha.

4. I-ovulation ye-irregular noma engekho emthethweni Uma ubona ukungahambisani okungaguquki kumaphethini we-ovulation noma usola ukuthi awukhuli nhlobo, kungakhombisa inkinga eyisisekelo. I-ovulation ye-irregular noma engakholeki ingabangelwa ukungalingani kwe-hormonal, i-polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS), noma ezinye izimo ezidinga ukuhlolwa.

5. Ukugcwala ngokweqile Ukudlula ama-cloots amakhulu wegazi ngesikhathi sakho kungaba uphawu lokugcwala ngokweqile. Ngenkathi ama-clots amancane ajwayelekile, ama-clots amakhulu noma ajwayelekile angakhombisa impikiswano efana nama-fibroids e-Uterine noma ukungalingani kwe-hormonal okuthinta amandla egazi okufaka kahle.

6. I-Migraines yokuya esikhathini Uma uhlangabezana nobuhlungu bekhanda obukhulu noma ama-migraines avela njalo, ngesikhathi, noma ngemuva kwesikhathi sakho, kungahle kuhlobane nokushintshashintsha kwe-hormonal. I-Migraines yokuya esikhathini ingakhubazeka futhi ingadinga ukuphathwa kwezokwelapha.

7. Ukushintshwa kwemizwelo noma izinguquko ezingokomzwelo Uma ubona ukushintshwa kwemizwa okubalulekile, ukungacasuki, ukucindezelwa, noma ukukhathazeka okuhambisana nomjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini, kungaba uphawu lwe-premnstrual syndrome (PMDSSTRIC Lezi zimo zingayithinta kakhulu inhlala-mpilo yakho ngokomzwelo kanye nekhwalithi yempilo.

heading: Ngazi kanjani isikhathi sami asiphilile
title: Ukubona izikhathi ezingaphili
body:
izimpawu zesikhathi sokuya esikhathini okungenampilo Isikhathi sokuya esikhathini esinempilo siyinkomba ebalulekile yempilo yokuzala. Kodwa-ke, kunezimpawu ezithile nezimpawu ezingakhombisa isikhathi sakho asiphilile. Kubalulekile ukunaka lezi zibonakaliso futhi uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo uma uhlangabezana nalokhu okulandelayo:

1. Imijikelezo yokuya esikhathini engajwayelekile Uma imijikelezo yakho yokuya esikhathini ihlala ingajwayelekile, okusho ukuthi kwenzeka ngezikhathi ezingalindelekile noma zinokuhlukahluka okuphambili ngobude bokujikeleza, kungakhombisa ukungalingani kwe-hormonal noma ezinye izindaba zezempilo. Izikhathi ezingekho emthethweni zingenza kube yinselele ngokwengeziwe ukulandelela i-ovulation futhi kungathinta ukuzala.

2. Ukopha ngokweqile noma okuhlala isikhathi eside Uma ukuhamba kwakho kokuya esikhathini kunzima kakhulu noma kuhlala isikhathi eside kunezinsuku eziyi-7, kungaba uphawu lwesimo esibizwa ngokuthi amaMenorrhagia. AmaMenorrhagia angaholela ekulahlekelweni kwegazi okubalulekile, ukukhathala, futhi angakhombisa inkinga eyisisekelo efana nokungalingani kwama-hormonal, ama-fibroids e-Uterine, noma ama-polyps.

3. Izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini ezinzima Ngenkathi okunye ukungaphatheki kahle noma ukuminyanisa ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini kujwayelekile, ubuhlungu obukhulu obuphazamisa imisebenzi yansuku zonke bungaba uphawu lwezimo ezinjenge-endometriosis noma i-adenomyosis. Lezi zimo zingadala ubuhlungu obukhulu be-pelvic, izinhlungu emuva, futhi kungadinga ukungenelela kwezokwelapha.

4. I-ovulation ye-irregular noma engekho emthethweni Uma ubona ukungahambisani okungaguquki emaphethini we-ovulation noma uma usola ukuthi ungavuli nhlobo, kungathinta ukuzala kwakho. I-ovulation ye-irregular noma engekho emthethweni ingahle ibangelwa ukungalingani kwe-hormonal, i-polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS), noma ezinye izimo ezingaphansi ezidinga ukuhlolwa.

5. Izimpawu ze-PremenctRual Syndrome (PMS) Izimpawu ze-PMS zijwayelekile ngaphambi kokuya esikhathini, kepha uma zinzima futhi zithinta kakhulu ikhwalithi yempilo yakho, kungakhombisa ukuphazamiseka kwe-dysphoric (PMDD). I-PMDD iyindlela enzima kakhulu ye-PMS futhi ingadala ukucindezelwa okungokomzwelo, ukuguquguquka kwemizwelo, ukukhathazeka nokudangala.

6. Iphazamisekile Imisebenzi yansuku zonke Uma isikhathi sakho sokuya esikhathini siphazamisa ngokungaguquki imisebenzi yakho yansuku zonke ephuzwini lapho ungakwazi ukwenza ama-routines ajwayelekile, kungaba uphawu lwenkinga yezempilo engaphansi. Lokhu kungafaka ukukhathala ngokweqile, ubuhlungu obukhulu, ukopha okunamandla, noma ezinye izimpawu eziphazamisa umsebenzi, isikole, noma impilo yezenhlalo.

7. Izinguquko kumaphethini okuya esikhathini Uma ubona ushintsho olubalulekile emaphethini wokuya esikhathini, njengokuzenzisa imijikelezo noma imijikelezo emide, izinguquko ezingazelelwe ngokugeleza, noma ukopha okungazelelwe phakathi kwezikhathi, kubalulekile ukuxhumana nomuntu ochwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo. Lezi zinguquko zingahle zibe ngumphumela wokungalingani kwe-hormonal, ukuphazamiseka kokuzala, noma ezinye izimo zezempilo.

heading: Yiziphi izikhathi eziphilile?
title: Imijikelezo yokuya esikhathini enempilo
body:
Ukuqonda izikhathi zokuya esikhathini ezinempilo Ukuya esikhathini kuyinqubo yemvelo eyenzeka ohlelweni lokuzala lwabesifazane. Ngenkathi konke okuhlangenwe nakho kwabesifazane kungahluka, kunezici ezithile zesikhathi sokuya esikhathini esinempilo esingakhombisa inhlala-kahle. Nazi ezinye izici ezibalulekile okufanele zicatshangelwe:

1. Ejwayelekile Isikhathi sokuya esikhathini esinempilo ngokuvamile, okusho ukuthi kwenzeka ngezikhathi ezithile. Umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini uvame ukuhlala phakathi kwezinsuku ezingama-21 kuya kwezingama-35, kunabesifazane abaningi bezwa umjikelezo wezinsuku ezingama-28. Kodwa-ke, ukuhlukahluka okuncane ngobude bomjikelezo kujwayelekile, inqobo nje uma behlala ngaphakathi kobubanzi obujwayelekile bomuntu.

2. Isikhathi Isikhathi sokuya esikhathini esinempilo sivame ukuhlala phakathi kwezinsuku ezi-3 neze-7. Izikhathi ezimfishane noma ezinde zingaba yinto ejwayelekile kwabanye besifazane, kepha izikhathi ezifushane ngokweqile noma ezinde kakhulu zingakhombisa izingqinamba zezempilo ezingafanele okudingidwa kuchwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo.

3. Ukugeleza Ukuhamba kokuya esikhathini okunempilo kubonakala ngenani elilinganiselwe lokulahleka kwegazi. Umbala wegazi ngokuvamile ubomvu noma ububomvu obumnyama, futhi ungaqukatha ama-clots amancane. Ukugeleza okusindayo noma okukhanyayo ngokweqile kungabonakala kokungalingani kwama-hormonal, ukungahambi kahle kwesibeletho, noma ezinye izimo zezokwelapha ezidinga ukuhlolwa.

4. Ukungabikho kobuhlungu obukhulu Ngenkathi ukungaphatheki kahle noma ukuminyanisa ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini kuvamile, izinhlungu ezinzima noma eziwohlokayo zingaba uphawu lwezinkinga zezempilo ezingaphansi, njenge-endometriosis noma ama-fibroids e-uterine. Isikhathi sokuya esikhathini esinempilo ngokuvamile siphatheke ngokukhokhwa kwabuhlungu okuphikisayo futhi asibaphazamisi kakhulu imisebenzi yansuku zonke.

5. Ukuphazamiseka okuncane empilweni yansuku zonke Isikhathi sokuya esikhathini esinempilo sivumela abesifazane ukuthi bazibandakanye emisebenzini yabo yansuku zonke ngaphandle kokuphazamiseka okukhulu. Ngenkathi abanye besifazane bengathola ushintsho lwesikhashana kumazinga wamandla, imizwa, noma isifiso sokudla, lezi akufanele zibe zimbi kakhulu njengokuphazamisa umsebenzi, isikole, noma impilo yenhlalo.

6. Ukuvumelana ngezimpawu Ngenkathi ukuhlukahluka okuncane ezimpawuni zokuya esikhathini kujwayelekile, isikhathi sokuya esikhathini esinempilo ngokuvamile silandela iphethini elingaguquki kulowo nalowo. Lokhu kufaka phakathi izimpawu zokubikezelwa ze-preptual ezibikezelekile, njengokuba ububele bebele, ukuqhakaza, noma izinguquko zemood, kanye nesikhathi esiguqukayo kanye nezimpawu zokugeleza kokuya esikhathini.

7. I-ovulation ejwayelekile I-ovulation iyingxenye ebalulekile yomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini ezinempilo. I-ovulation ejwayelekile ikhombisa ibhalansi efanele ye-hormonal kanye namathuba okuzala. Abesifazane abathola imijikelezo yokuya esikhathini engaguquki kungenzeka ukuthi bavelele njalo, okuyinto ebalulekile yempilo yokuzala.
Kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi ukuhlukahluka esikhathini sezikhathi zokuya esikhathini kungenzeka ngenxa yezici ezifana nengcindezi, ukugula, izinguquko ngesisindo, noma ukuguquguquka kwe-hormonal. Kodwa-ke, uma unezinto ezikhathazayo ngempilo yezikhathi zakho zokuya esikhathini, noma uma uhlangabezana nezinguquko ezibalulekile noma izimpawu ezingejwayelekile, kunconywe ukuthintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze kuhlolwe kahle nokuholwa okufanele.

heading: Ubulili kulungile lapho begula
title: Ucansi ngenkathi ngigula
body:
Ingabe ubulili kulungile lapho bugula? Uma kukhulunywa ngokuhlanganyela emsebenzini wobulili ngenkathi ugula, impendulo incike ezintweni ezahlukahlukene. Kubalulekile ukubheka uhlobo lokugula kwakho, izimpawu zakho, kanye nezinga lakho lokududuza jikelele. Nawa amanye amaphuzu athile okufanele acatshangelwe:

1. Xhumana nomlingani wakho Ukukhulumisana okuvulekile nokuthembekile nomlingani wakho kubalulekile. Xoxa ngokugula kwakho, izimpawu, nanoma yikuphi ukukhathazeka okungenzeka ukuthi ube nakho. Ukuqonda kanye nesivumelwano kubalulekile ukuze kuqinisekiswe okuhlangenwe nakho okunethezekile nojabulisayo.

2. Cabanga ngohlobo lokugula kwakho Uhlobo nobukhali bokugula kwakho kudlala indima enkulu ekunqumeni ukuthi ngabe kuphephile yini ukwenza imisebenzi yezocansi. Ukugula okuncane njengokudla okubandayo okubandayo noma kwesizini, ubulili buvame ukubhekwa njengephephile uma uzizwa unakho futhi izimpawu zakho zingezinhle ngokweqile. Kodwa-ke, ngenxa yezifo ezinzima ngokwengeziwe, njengomkhuhlane noma ukutheleleka okuthathelwalelayo, kungakuhle ukuthi ugweme umsebenzi wezocansi uze watholakele ukuvikela ukusakaza ukugula kumlingani wakho.

3. Hlola izimpawu zakho Cabanga ngezimpawu zakho ezithile nokuthi zingathinta kanjani amandla akho okuhlanganyela emsebenzini wobulili ngokunethezeka. Isibonelo, uma unokukhwehlela okuphikelelayo, ukugcwala, noma ukuphefumula ubunzima, izikhundla ezithile zocansi noma imisebenzi ethile kungaba yinselele noma zingakhululeki. Kubalulekile ukubeka phambili inhlalakahle yakho futhi ugweme noma yimiphi imisebenzi engabeka izimpawu zakho noma wandise ukululama kwakho.

4. Phatha amazinga akho wamandla Lapho uyagula, amazinga akho wamandla angaba ngaphansi kunokujwayelekile. Kubalulekile ukulalela umzimba wakho futhi uhlole ukuthi unawo yini amandla omzimba wokusebenza ngocansi. Uma uzizwa ugcwele noma ubuthakathaka, kungcono kakhulu ukubeka phambili ukuphumula nokululama kunokuba uhlanganyele emsebenzini onzima womzimba.

5. Prakthiza inhlanzeko enhle Akunandaba ukuthi uyagula noma cha, ukuzijwayeza inhlanzeko enhle kubalulekile ngesikhathi socansi. Geza izandla zakho ngaphambi nangemva, bese ubheka ukusebenzisa izithiyo ezinjengamakhondomu ukunciphisa ubungozi bokusakaza noma iziphi izifo.

6. Funa izeluleko zezokwelashwa Uma ungaqiniseki ukuthi kuphephile yini ukuya ocansini ngenkathi ugula, kuhlale kuwumqondo omuhle ukubonisana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo. Banganikeza umhlahlandlela owenziwe umuntu uqobo ngokuya ngesimo sakho esithile futhi banikeze izincomo ezihambisana nezidingo zakho.
Ekugcineni, isinqumo sokuzibandakanya emsebenzini wezocansi ngenkathi ugula ngumuntu uqobo. Kubalulekile ukubeka phambili inhlalakahle yakho, ukuxhumana ngokukhululekile nomlingani wakho, ulalele umzimba wakho. Ukuphumula nokuzinakekela kubalulekile ukuze kuvuseleleke ngokushesha, futhi kulungile ukugwema ubulili kuze kube yilapho uzizwa ungcono.

heading: Ingabe ucansi lukhulisa amasosha omzimba
title: Amasosha ocansi kanye namasosha omzimba
body:
Ngabe ubulili bukhulisa amasosha omzimba? Umsebenzi wezocansi uyingxenye yemvelo nejabulisayo yempilo yabantu, futhi kube yisihloko sentshisekelo yesayensi ngezinzuzo zawo zezempilo. Umbuzo owodwa ovame ukuba kuphakame ukuthi ngabe ucansi lungakhulisa amasosha omzimba. Ake sihlole lesi sihloko ngemininingwane ethe xaxa:

Amasosha omzimba Amasosha omzimba yinethiwekhi eyinkimbinkimbi yamaseli, izicubu, nezitho ezisebenza ngokubambisana ukuvikela umzimba kumagciwane alimazayo, anjengegciwane, amagciwane kanye nesikhunta. Idlala indima ebalulekile ekugcinweni kwezempilo ephelele nokuvikela ezifweni nasezifo.

izinzuzo ezingaba khona zobulili kumasosha omzimba Ngenkathi umthelela oqondile wokusebenza ngokocansi kumasosha omzimba useyindawo yocwaningo oluqhubekayo, kunezindlela ezithile ezingase zibe nemiphumela emihle:

1. Ukuncishiswa kwengcindezi Ukuzibandakanya emsebenzini wezocansi kungasiza ukunciphisa amazinga okucindezela. Izinga eliphakeme lokucindezela lingaba nomthelela omubi kumasosha omzimba, okwenza kube yimpumelelo ekulweni nezifo. Ngokukhuthaza ukuphumula kanye nokukhishwa kwama-endorphin, ubulili bungafaka isandla ngokungaqondile ekuphenduleni kokuzivikela komzimba.

2. Ukwanda kokukhiqizwa kwama-antibodies Ukusebenza ngokocansi kungaholela ekukhiqizeni okwengeziwe kwama-antibodies athile, njenge-Immunoglobulin a (Iga), edlala indima ebaluleke kakhulu ekuvikeleni izifo zokuphefumula kanye nasezingeniso kwathu. Kodwa-ke, kudingeka ucwaningo olwengeziwe ukuze uqonde ngokugcwele ubudlelwano phakathi kokusebenza ngokocansi nokukhiqizwa kwe-antilody.

3. Ukusebenza ngokomzimba Umsebenzi wezocansi uyindlela yokuzivocavoca umzimba. Ukuzivocavoca umzimba njalo kuyaziwa ukuthi kube nemiphumela emihle kumasosha omzimba ngokwenza ngcono ukujikeleza kwegazi, ukuthuthukisa ukukhishwa kwama-endorphin, kanye nokunciphisa ukuvuvukala kokuvuvukala. Lezi zinto zingaba negalelo ekuphenduleni kokuzivikela komzimba okunamandla kanye nempilo engcono.

4. Ukusondelana nokuqina okungokomzwelo Ukusebenza ngocansi kungathuthukisa inhlala-kahle engokomzwelo futhi kuqinise ubuhlobo obuseduze. Okuhlangenwe nakho okuhle okungokomzwelo kuxhunyaniswe nomsebenzi wokuzivikela komzimba okuthuthukile kanye nempilo yonke. Uzizwe uthandwa, uxhumekile, futhi uxhaswe ungaba nomthelela omuhle ukuphendula kwamasosha omzimba kuma-pathogen.

Ukucatshangelwa kanye nemikhawulo Kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi izinzuzo ezingaba khona zocansi kumasosha omzimba kufanele zibhekwe kanye nezinye izinto ezinomthelela empilweni yezempilo emzimbeni jikelele. Ukugcina impilo enempilo, kufaka phakathi ukudla okulinganiselayo, ukuvivinya umzimba njalo, ukulala okwanele, nokuphathwa kwengcindezi, yizinto ezibalulekile zamasosha omzimba aqinile.
Ngaphezu kwalokho, izimpendulo ngazinye zingahluka. Ngenkathi abanye abantu bengathola imiphumela emihle emasosheni abo omzimba ngenxa yokusebenza ngokocansi, abanye bangase bangayiboni imiphumela efanayo. Kubalulekile ukubeka phambili impilo yonke kanye nenhlala-kahle kunokuba uncike kuphela ekusebenzeni kwezocansi njengendlela yokuqinisa amasosha omzimba.

Isiphetho Ekuphetheni, ngenkathi umthelela oqondile wokusebenza ngokocansi kumasosha omzimba usazocwaninga, kunezindlela ezingaba khona lapho ucansi lungaba nemiphumela emihle ngempilo yomzimba. Ukuzibandakanya emsebenzini ngokocansi kungasiza ukunciphisa ukucindezelwa, nakho kungasekela ukuphendula okunempilo. Ngaphezu kwalokho, ubulili bungahle buhole ekukhiqizeni okwengeziwe kwama-antibodies, njenge-ImmunogLobulin a (Iga), edlalwa indima ebalulekile ekuvikeleni komzimba kanye nokutheleleka kwesisu. Ukusebenza ngokomzimba ngesikhathi socansi nakho kungasiza ekuphenduleni kokuzivikela komzimba okunamandla ngokwenza ngcono ukujikeleza kwegazi, ukukhulula i-endorphins, nokunciphisa ukuvuvukala kokuvuvukala. Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukusondelana okungokomzwelo nokuhlala kahle okuhlotshaniswa nokwenza ucansi kungaba nomthelela omuhle ekuphenduleni komzimba kumagciwane.
Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi izinzuzo zocansi kumasosha omzimba kufanele zibhekwe ngokuhlangana nezinye izinto ezifaka isandla empilweni yezempilo emzimbeni jikelele. Ukugcina impilo enempilo, kufaka phakathi ukudla okulinganiselayo, ukuvivinya umzimba njalo, ukulala okwanele, nokuphathwa kwengcindezi, yizinto ezibalulekile zokuvikela umzimba okuqinile. Izimpendulo ngazinye zingahlukahluka, futhi kubalulekile ukubeka phambili impilo yonke kanye nenhlala-kahle kunokuba zincike kuphela ekusebenzeni kwezocansi njengendlela yokukhulisa amasosha omzimba. +ka Kubalulekile ukuze ulondoloze indlela ephelele yokuzivikela emzimbeni, kucatshangelwa izinto ezahlukahlukene zokuphila kanye nokufuna izeluleko zochwepheshe zokwelashwa lapho kudingeka. Ngenkathi ukusebenza ngokobulili kungahle kube nezinzuzo ezingaba khona zokuzivikela komzimba, kufanele kubhekwe njengengxenye ehambisanayo yendlela yokuphila enempilo kunokuba ikhambi le-standalone. Ekugcineni, indlela enokulinganisela nephelele yokuzivikela emzimbeni, kufaka phakathi imikhuba enempilo kanye nokuhlolwa okujwayelekile kwezokwelapha, kubalulekile ukuze kugcinwe inhlala-kahle. +ka

heading: Yimuphi umbala wokukhipha amaqanda?
title: Umbala wokuphuma kwe-ovulation
body:

Lokhu kubhekwa njengokujwayelekile futhi akubonisi ngokujwayelekile noma yiziphi izinkathazo zempilo. Kubalulekile ukukhumbula ukuthi ukuphuma kowesifazane kwangasese kungahlukahluka kuye kumuntu kuya kumuntu, futhi izici ezinjengokudla, i-hydration, kanye nempilo yonke kungathonya umbala wayo nokuvumelana.

heading: Yini eyenza umfazi avule kakhudlwana?
title: Izici Zokuzala
body:
Izici ezenza umfazi avule kakhudlwana Izici eziningi zingathonya ukuzala kowesifazane, futhi ukubaqondakalise kungasiza abantu kanye nemibhangqwana yandisa amathuba abo okukhulelwa. Ngenkathi inzalo iyahlukahluka kuye kumuntu, izici ezithile zingaba nomthelela kowesifazane ovundile kakhudlwana. Ake sihlole ezinye zalezi zinto:

ubudala Iminyaka idlala indima enkulu ekuvuzeni kwabesifazane. Owesifazane uvame ukuvundile kakhulu kuma-20s akhe nasekuqaleni kwama-30. Njengomdala wesifazane, ubungako balo beqanda kanye nekhwalithi yakhe, okuholela ekuthambekeni. Ngemuva kweminyaka engu-35, inzalo yehla ngokushesha okukhulu, futhi ingozi yokuphuphuma kwesisu kanye nokulimala kwe-chromosomal kwanda.

Ukujikeleza njalo kokuya esikhathini Umjikelezo ojwayelekile wokuya esikhathini ukhombisa ukuthi owesifazane uyavuka njalo, okubaluleke kakhulu ekukhulelweni. I-ovulation yinqubo yokukhipha iqanda elivuthiwe kusuka kuma-ovari, okwenza litholakale ukuze umanyolo. Ubude obungaguquki bokujikeleza kokuya esikhathini, imvamisa izinsuku ezingama-28, buka ibhalansi ye-hormonal enempilo ne-ovulation ejwayelekile.

Isisindo somzimba esinempilo Ukugcina isisindo somzimba esinempilo kubalulekile ukuze kuzalaniswe. Kokubili ukuba mkhulu kanye nokukhuluphala ngokweqile kungaphazamisa ibhalansi ye-hormonal futhi kuphazamise i-ovulation. Abesifazane abanenkomba yesisindo somzimba (BMI) ngaphandle kwebanga elijwayelekile bangathola imijikelezo yokuya esikhathini engajwayelekile noma i-annovation (ukuntuleka kwe-ovulation). Ukuthola isisindo esinempilo kungandisa ukuzala.

izindlela zokuphila ezinempilo Izici ezihlukile zokuphila zingathinta ukuzala kowesifazane:

1. Ukudla okunempilo Ukudla ukudla okulinganiselayo okunothile ngezithelo, imifino, okusanhlamvu okugcwele, amaprotheni anciphile, namafutha anempilo ahlinzeka izakhi ezibalulekile zempilo yokuzala. Izakhamzimba ezithile ezinjengezikola, i-iron, nama-omega-ama-acidi ama-omega-3 zizuzisa kakhulu ukuzala.

2. Ukuzivocavoca Ukuzivocavoca okulinganiselayo nokujwayelekile kukhuthaza impilo yonke, kufaka phakathi impilo yokuzala. Kuyasiza ukugcina isisindo esinempilo, kuthuthukisa ukujikeleza kwegazi, kunciphisa ukucindezela, futhi kuthuthukise ibhalansi ye-hormonal. Kodwa-ke, ukuzivocavoca ngokweqile noma ukuqeqeshwa okukhulu kungathinta kabi inzalo, ngakho-ke kubalulekile ukuthola ibhalansi.

3. Ukugwema izinto eziyingozi Ukugwema izinto ezingalimaza ukuzala zibalulekile. Ukubhema, ukusetshenziswa ngokweqile kotshwala, kanye nokusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa okungekho emthethweni konke kungathinta impilo yokuzala futhi kunciphise ukuzala. Kubalulekile ukugwema ukuvezwa ubuthi bemvelo kanye nomkhawulo wokuphuza i-caffeine.

4. Ukuphathwa kwengcindezi Izinga eliphakeme lokucindezela lingaphazamisa ibhalansi ye-hormonal futhi iphazamise i-ovulation. Ukuzijwayeza amasu okuphatha ukucindezela okufana nokuzivocavoca, ukuzindla, i-yoga, kanye nokuzivocavoca kokuphumula kungasiza ukunciphisa amazinga okucindezela futhi kukhuthaze ukuzala.

Isidoda singasinda kwipheshana lokuzala labesifazane izinsuku eziningana, ngakho-ke njengoba nokwabelana nokwenziwa kocansi njalo ezinsukwini ezimbili kuya kwezintathu kuqinisekisa ukuthi i-sperm ikhona lapho kwenzeka i-ovulation.

heading: Iyiphi inyanga ehamba phambili yokukhulelwa?
title: Inyanga ehamba phambili yokukhulelwa
body:

heading: Yimuphi unyaka wesidoda sendoda evundile kakhulu?
title: Ukuzala kwabesilisa ngeminyaka
body:
Ukuzalwa kwabesilisa: iminyaka evundile kakhulu yesidoda Uma kukhulunywa ngokuzala kwabesilisa, ubudala bungadlala indima kwikhwalithi nobungako besidoda. Ngenkathi abesifazane bevame ukuqaphela umthelela wobudala ekuvumeni, kubalulekile ukuqonda ukuthi amabanga anabantu athinta kanjani amadoda. Ake sihlole iminyaka evundile kakhulu yesidoda nokuthi ishintsha kanjani ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.

Ukuzala okuphezulu Amadoda ngokuvamile ahlangabezana nokuzala kwawo okuphezulu ngesikhathi sawo seminyaka yobudala nasekuqaleni kwama-20. Kulesi sikhathi, ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda kusezingeni eliphakeme kakhulu, futhi ikhwalithi yesidoda ngokuvamile ilungile. Ukuhamba kwesidoda, ukuthembeka kwe-morphology, kanye nobuqotho be-DNA ngokuvamile kungcono kakhulu ngalesi sikhathi, kwandisa amathuba okuvundiswa okuphumelelayo.
I-

ubudala kanye nekhwalithi yesidoda Njengamadoda adala, ikhwalithi yesidoda sabo ingahle incike kancane. Ngenkathi abanye abantu bengaqhubeka nokukhiqiza isidoda esiphilile kuma-50s abo noma ngale kwalokho, abanye bangathola ukwehla kwamapharamitha ahlobene nokuzala. Ukwehla kwekhwalithi yesidoda nobudala kungafaka i-motility eyehlisiwe, okungajwayelekile kwe-morphology, kanye nomonakalo owengeziwe we-DNA.

asebeni athuthukile kaPaternal Iminyaka yoyise oyi-Advanced, imvamisa ichazwa njengeminyaka engama-35 nangaphezulu, ihlotshaniswa nobungozi obuthile nokucatshangelwa. Ucwaningo luye lwabonisa ukuthi njengamadoda asebekhulile, amathuba okuguqulwa kwezakhi zofuzo ekukhuphukeni kwesidoda, okungaholela engcupheni ephezulu yokuphazamiseka kwezakhi zofuzo.

Ezinye izinto ezithinta ikhwalithi yesidoda Ngenkathi iminyaka yobudala iyisici esibalulekile, kubalulekile ukuze uqaphele ukuthi enye indlela yokuphila nempilo nayo ingathinta ikhwalithi yesidoda. Lezi zinto zifaka:
  • Ukubhema: Ukubhema kuxhunyaniswe nokwehliswa kokubala kwesidoda, motility, kanye nobuqotho be-DNA.
  • utshwala kanye nokusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa: ukusetshenziswa ngokweqile kwezidakamizwa kanye nokusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa kungathinta kabi ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda nekhwalithi.
  • Okhuluphele: Ukukhuluphala ngokweqile noma ukukhuluphala kungaba nomthelela ekungalinganisweni kwama-hormonal okungathinta impilo yesidoda.
  • Izici zezemvelo: Ukuchayeka kubuthi obuthile, amakhemikhali, kanye nemisebe kungathinta ikhwalithi yesidoda.
  • Impilo Kazwelonke: Izimo Zempilo Ezingamahlalakhona kanye nemithi ethile ingathonya ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda nekhwalithi.

    Isiphetho Iminyaka evutha kakhulu yesidoda sabesilisa imvamisa ngesikhathi sayo seentsha nasekuqaleni kwama-20s lapho ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda kanye nekhwalithi sekuphezulu. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi ukuhlukahluka komuntu ngamunye kukhona, futhi amadoda amaningi angaqhubeka nokukhiqiza isidoda esiphilile kuma-50s awo angama-50 noma ngaphezulu. Iminyaka yobudala ethuthukisiwe, ngokuvamile ichazwa njengeminyaka engama-35 nangaphezulu, ingathwala ingozi ephakeme kancane yokuguqulwa kwezakhi zofuzo ngesidoda.
    Kubalulekile ukugcina impilo enempilo, gwema imikhuba elimazayo, futhi ubhekane nanoma yiziphi izimo zezempilo ezingaphansi kokwenza kahle ikhwalithi yesidoda kunoma yimuphi unyaka. Uma unezinto ezikhathazayo ngokuzala kwabesilisa noma ubhekene nobunzima bokukhulelwa, kunconywa ukuthi uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo abanganikeza izeluleko ezenziwe ngezifiso ezisuselwa ezimweni zakho ezihlukile.

heading: Yisiphi isidoda esingcono kakhulu sokukhulelwa?
title: Isidoda esihle kakhulu sokukhulelwa
body:
isiphi isidoda esingcono kakhulu sokukhulelwa? Uma kukhulunywa ngokuthola ukukhulelwa, ikhwalithi nempilo yesidoda idlala indima ebalulekile. Ngenkathi bonke isidoda sinamandla okufaka umanyolo iqanda, izici ezithile zingakhulisa amathuba okukhulelwa okuphumelelayo. Ake sihlole izici ezinquma isidoda esihle kakhulu sokukhulelwa.
I-

ukubala kwesidoda Inani lesidoda elikhona ngesidoda, esaziwa ngokuthi ukubala kwesidoda, liyisici esibalulekile ekunqumeni ukuzala. Ukubala kwesidoda esiphakeme kukhulisa amathuba okuvundiswa okuphumelelayo. I-World Health Organisation (WHO) ichaza ukubalwa kwesidoda esithi "esijwayelekile" ukuba okungenani kube nesidoda okungenani esiyizigidi eziyi-15 nge-millilitter yesidoda. Kodwa-ke, ngisho nokubalwa okuphansi kusengaholela ekukhulelweni.

isidoda motility I-Motility ibhekisela emandleni wesidoda ukuba ahambe ngempumelelo. Isidoda kufanele sizulazule ngepheshana lokuzala labesifazane ukuze lifinyelele iqanda ukuze likhwelwe. Isisusa esiphakeme sinika amandla ukubhukuda kahle futhi kwandisa amathuba okufinyelela iqanda. Ukuhamba phambili okuqhubekayo, okubonisa ukunyakaza phambili, kubaluleke kakhulu ekukhulelweni okuphumelelayo.
I-

Isidoda seMorphology I-Sperm Morphology ibhekisela ngosayizi, ukwakheka kanye nokwakheka kwamaseli wesidoda. Isidoda esakhelwe kahle nge-morphology ejwayelekile sinethuba eliphakeme lokufaka iqanda. Ukuhlukumezeka ku-sperm morphology, njengamakhanda ama-misshapen noma imisila, kungavimba amandla abo okungena egcekeni lokuvikela iqanda futhi kunciphise amathuba wokuvundiswa okuphumelelayo.
I-

isidoda se-DNA Ubuqotho Ubuqotho be-SPEMM DNA bubaluleke kakhulu ekukhulelweni okunempilo. I-DNA eyonakalisiwe kumaseli wesidoda ingaholela ekungatheni i-chromosomal ku-umbungu okuholela, ukwandisa ingozi yokuphuphuma kwesisu noma ukuphazamiseka kofuzo. Isidoda esine-DNA esingalinganiswa sinethuba eliphakeme lokufaka iqanda futhi lifaka isandla ekukhulelweni okunempilo.

izici zendlela yokuphila Izici eziningi zokuphila zingathinta ikhwalithi yesidoda. Ukwandisa amathuba okukhulelwa, kungakuhle:
  • Gwema ukubhema nokuzijabulisa kwezidakamizwa, ngoba kungathinta kabi ukubalwa kwesidoda kanye motility.
  • Gcina isisindo esinempilo, njengoba ukukhuluphala kungaba nomthelela ekungalinganisweni kwama-hormonal futhi kunciphise ikhwalithi yesidoda.
  • Khawula ukusetshenziswa kotshwala, njengokuphuza ngokweqile kotshwala kungalimaza ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda nekhwalithi. I-
  • yehlisa ukuvezwa kobuthi bemvelo kanye nokungcola okungaba nomthelela olimazayo ngempilo yesidoda.
  • Phatha amazinga okuxineka, njengoba ukucindezela okungamahlalakhona kungaphazamisa umsebenzi wokuzala.

    Isiphetho Ngenkathi sonke isidoda sinamandla okufaka umquba iqanda, izici ezithile zandisa amathuba okuba yimpumelelo. Isidoda esiphakeme esiphezulu, i-motility enhle, i-morphology ejwayelekile, ne-DNA eqinile iyizici ezinhle zokuthola ukukhulelwa. Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukwamukela indlela yokuphila enempilo nokugwema imikhuba engaba nomthelela omubi ngokweqile ikhwalithi yesidoda ingaphinde isebenzise ukuzala.
    Kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi inzalo iyinqubo eyinkimbinkimbi, futhi impilo yokuzala yabalingani idlala indima ekuzuzeni ukukhulelwa. Uma unezinto ezikhathazayo ngokuzala kwakho noma ubhekene nobunzima bokukhulelwa, kunconywa ukuthi abonane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo abanganikeza izeluleko ezenziwe ngezifiso ezisuselwa ezimweni zakho ezihlukile.

heading: Ngabe i-Wheely Sperm ingakhulelwa umfazi?
title: Isidoda esinamanzi nokukhulelwa
body:
ingabe isidoda esinamanzi singathola umfazi okhulelwe? Izici eziningi zifaka isandla emandleni wesidoda ukwenza umanyolo iqanda futhi kuholele ekukhulelweni. Ngenkathi ukuvumelana noma ukubukeka kwesidoda kungahlukahluka, kufaka phakathi ukuba nesidoda esinamanzi, akubonisi ukuzala inzalo noma thinta amandla okukhulelwa.
I-

Ukwakheka kwesidoda Isidoda, esikhungathekile ngesikhathi sokuya ocansini, ingxube yamaseli wesidoda, uketshezi oluvela kuma-vesics asemasinali kanye ne-prostate gland, nezinye izintambo. Ukuvumelana kwesidoda kungasukela kusuka kokunyene nokunamathela kumanzi. Kujwayelekile ukuthi ukuvumelana kokuhluka ngokuya ngezinto ezinjengamazinga we-hydration, ukuvusa ngokocansi, kanye nomzimba womuntu ngamunye.

Iqhaza lesidoda ekuvundiseni Uma kukhulunywa ngokumiswa, isici esibaluleke kakhulu yikhwalithi nobungako besidoda kunokuvumelana nokuvumelana kwesidoda. Amangqamuzana wesidoda anama-microscopic futhi abhukuda esibelethweni, amashubhu e-Uterus, kanye nama-Fallopian rubes ukufinyelela iqanda ukuze anyuswe umanyolo. Ingxenyana encane kuphela yesidoda esivinjiwe esinda kulolu hambo, futhi lezo ezifanele zikwazi ukungena engxenyeni yangaphandle yeqanda.

impilo yesidoda nokuzala Ngenkathi isidoda esinamanzi kungenzeka singaphazamisi ukuzala, ezinye izinto zingathinta impilo nokusebenza kwesidoda, kufaka phakathi:
  • isidoda ukubala: Inani lamaseli wesidoda ku-seanes. Ukubala kwesidoda okuphezulu kukhulisa amathuba wokuvundiswa okuphumelelayo.
  • isidoda se-sperm: amandla wesidoda ukubhukuda ngempumelelo. Isisusa esihle siyadingeka ukuthi isidoda sifinyelele futhi singene eqanda.
  • isidoda se-morphology: ukwakheka kanye nokwakheka kwesidoda. Ukungahambi kahle ku-sperm morphology kungavimba umanyolo. I-
  • isidoda se-DNA Ubuqotho: Ukulimala kwe-DNA kumaseli wesidoda kungathinta amandla abo okufaka iqanda futhi kube nomthelela ekukhulelweni okunempilo.

    Izici ezithinta impilo yesidoda Indlela yokuphila eminingi kanye nezici zezemvelo zingathonya impilo yesidoda. Lokhu kufaka:
      I-
    • yobudala: Ikhwalithi yesidoda ingahle incike iminyaka yobudala, okuphumela ekukhiqizweni okuncishisiwe.
    • Ukubhema: Ukubhema ugwayi kungaba nomthelela omubi ekubaleni kwesidoda, motility, kanye nempilo yesidoda yonke.
    • utshwala kanye nokusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa: ukusetshenziswa ngokweqile kwezidakamizwa kanye nokusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa okungekho emthethweni kungathinta ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda nekhwalithi. I-
    • Okesity: Ukukhuluphala ngokweqile noma ukukhuluphala kungaba nomthelela ekungalinganisweni kwama-hormonal futhi kunciphise ikhwalithi yesidoda.
    • Ukuvezwa kokushisa: Ukuchayeka isikhathi eside kumazinga okushisa aphezulu, njengamashubhu ashisayo noma ama-saunas, kunganciphisa okwesikhashana ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda.
    • Ubuthi bezemvelo: Ukuchayeka kumakhemikhali athile noma ubuthi emsebenzini noma imvelo kungaba nemiphumela emibi ngempilo yesidoda.

      lapho ukufuna izeluleko zokwelashwa Uma wena nomlingani wakho bebelokhu bezama ukukhulelwa isikhathi esibalulekile ngaphandle kwempumelelo, kungasiza ukubonisana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo. Bangakwazi ukuhlola bobabili impilo yokuzala yabalingani futhi banikeze ukuholwa ngezinhloso ezingaba khona zokuzala.
      Ekuphetheni, ukuguquguquka okunamanzi kwesidoda akunamphumela amathuba abesifazane okukhulelwa. Amandla okukhulelwa ancike kakhulu kwikhwalithi nenani lesidoda kunokubonakala kwesidoda. Impilo yesidoda, kufaka phakathi ukubalwa kwesidoda, motility, morphology, kanye nobuqotho be-DNA, kudlala indima ebalulekile ekuvundisweni okuphumelelayo.
      Izici ezinjengobudala, ukubhema, utshwala kanye nokusebenzisa izidakamizwa, ukukhuluphala, ukuvezwa kokushisa, kanye nobuthi bemvelo kungathinta impilo yesidoda. Kubalulekile kubo bobabili abalingani ukuthi balondoloze impilo enempilo futhi banciphise ukuvezwa kwezinto eziyingozi ukwenza kahle ukuzala.
      Uma wena nomlingani wakho bebelokhu bezama ukukhulelwa ngaphandle kwempumelelo isikhathi esibalulekile, kungahle kube yinzuzo ukufuna izeluleko zezokwelashwa. Uchwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo obhekele ukuzala ungahlolisisa impilo yokuzala yabalingani, ukhombe noma yiziphi izingqinamba eziyisisekelo, futhi unikeze izinketho ezifanele kanye nezinketho zokwelashwa.
      Khumbula, ukuzala kuyindaba eyinkimbinkimbi, futhi izici eziningi zifaka isandla ekukhulelweni okuphumelelayo. Uma unezinto ezikhathazayo ngokuzala kwakho noma ubhekene nobunzima bokukhulelwa, kungcono ukubonana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo abanganikeza izeluleko ezenziwe ngezifiso ezisuselwa esimweni sakho esiyingqayizivele.
